articles.title: Shubman Gill Posts Two-Word Tweet After India's WTC Final Loss Against Australia | Cricket News - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India had a forgettable outing with the bat on Sunday as they were bundled out for 234 in the chase of 444 against Australia in the World Test Championship final.
articles.content: India had a forgettable outing with the bat on Sunday as they were bundled out for 234 in the chase of 444 against Australia in the World Test Championship final. India needed 280 on Day 5 with seven… [+1805 chars]

articles.title: Hunter Valley: Ten people killed in wedding bus crash in Australia - BBC
articles.description: The bus was returning from a wedding in the Hunter Valley, north of Sydney, when it overturned.
articles.content:
At least 10 people have died and 15 others are in hospital after a wedding bus crashed in an Australian wine region north of Sydney, officials say.
